components.description: Tektro alloy composite 3-finger with reach adjust and Kraton insert on lever blade, with Jagwire compressionless housing.
SR Suntour FD-XCM208 down pull 34.9 (F), SRAM SX4 (R)
WTB SpeedDisc XC double wall disc specific with anodized finish, 32H
Bio Tuned Ergonomic Components dual density anatomical design
26" x 1.9" smooth rolling all weather Touring
Hayes Mechanical Disc Brakes(F), Hayes Mechanical Disc Brakes(R)
Alloy adjustable front, 55 degree movement and front-load cap. Rear stoker stem alloy with adjustable length.
Schwinn Custom Drawn 'N Litened Gold Label aluminum with Comfort Tuned tandem geometry, Semi-Integrated head tube, Epicenter seat stays, removable derailleur hanger, rack and WB bosses
Schwinn Comfort Tuned Plus Super Soft elastomer memory foam with special waterproof stretch cover
Alloy with micro adjust head (front) Alloy suspension w micro adjust head, pre-load adjust with 35mm travel (rear) 31.6 x 330mm
